X.i.6.F.3.i
.
MSC Actions if an Examination Report Is Insufficient
When DRAS updates VTA to indicate that an IDES examination report has been found insufficient for rating purposes, VTA will send both the PEBLO and MSC assigned a notification via e-mail.
If a PEBLO states that the corrected examination report is required for MEB processing, the MSC must provide the corrected examination report once it becomes available.
Important
:  The MSC must
not
change the change the date initially entered in the EXAM END DATE or MEDICAL EVALUATION END DATE fields in VTA on the basis of an insufficient exam finding made by DRAS.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
